name: 00:00 (Zerotime)
description:
The only way to stop the cosmic contamination was the total annihilation of the XF5 sector. Escape to the Warpgate on the last remaining rescue shuttle before the shock wave reaches you!

  • Manage the shuttle’s speed from the bridge with A and D keys
  • Regulate the reactor’s pressure to delay engine malfunction
  • Repair the engine by holding E to maintain current speed
  • Make sure the batteries are set up in their cells
